title: Gemini 3 Pro vs Google Dialogflow: Which AI Tool is Better in 2025?
metaDescription: Compare Gemini 3 Pro vs Google Dialogflow. See pricing, features, pros & cons to choose the best AI tool for your needs in 2025.
introduction: Choosing between Gemini 3 Pro and Google Dialogflow? These AI tools serve different but sometimes overlapping purposes, each with unique strengths. This comparison breaks down the key differences to help you decide.

sections.title: Overview: Gemini 3 Pro vs Google Dialogflow
paragraphs: Gemini 3 Pro (llms) is Gemini 3 Pro is Google's latest flagship AI model, launched in 2025 with groundbreaking multimodal capabilities. It achieves a 76.2% score on SWE-bench Verified (surpassing Claude Sonnet 4.5's 70%), features a 1M token context window with 64K output, and uniquely offers full native video processing alongside text and images. Its key differentiator is best-in-class reasoning combined with true multimodal understanding including video, making it ideal for complex analysis and agentic workflows.. It's known for llm, multimodal, video-understanding.

Google Dialogflow (agent platforms) is Google Dialogflow is a conversational AI platform for designing and integrating chatbots and voice assistants. It enables developers to build natural, multi-turn dialogues using pre-built agents, intent recognition, and entity extraction. Its key differentiator is deep integration with Google Cloud services, Google Assistant, and a wide range of messaging channels, making it a robust choice for scalable, enterprise-grade conversational interfaces.. Users choose it for conversational-ai, chatbot-builder, voice-assistant.

sections.title: Key Features
paragraphs: Gemini 3 Pro: 76.2% SWE-bench Verified score (highest available), 1M token context window with 64K output, Native video processing (unique among all models)

Google Dialogflow: Intent recognition and classification for understanding user goals, System and developer-defined entity extraction for capturing key information, Multi-turn, context-aware conversation flows with fulfillment via webhooks

verdict: Both Gemini 3 Pro and Google Dialogflow are excellent AI tools. Your choice depends on specific needs: Gemini 3 Pro for llm, Google Dialogflow for conversational-ai.
